quote: Love life, Live Love
author: Benny Bellamacina

quote: I want to Live! Not Die, Not Hide, LIVE!
author: Margaret Peterson Haddix,  Among the Hidden

quote: Live free or die.
author: Lauren Oliver,  Requiem

quote: I don’t know what it means to live.
author: Haruki Murakami,  Kafka on the Shore

quote: Live your life, no matter what that life is.
author: Corey Taylor,  Seven Deadly Sins: Settling the Argument Between Born Bad and Damaged Good

quote: Live simply so that others may simply live.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: Live like there’s no tomorrow and learn as if your life depends on it
author: Omar Kiam

quote: love the life you live.live the life you love.
author: Bob Marley

quote: To live is to choose. But to choose well, you must know who you are and what you stand for, where you want to go and why you want to get there.
author: Kofi Annan

quote: But what is life if you don't live it?
author: James Patterson,  Suzanne's Diary for Nicholas

quote: Live like you were dying, Love because you are.
author: Mark Green

quote: Live, Princess, for me. I love You
author: Molly McAdams,  Stealing Harper

quote: Live to learn to love. Learn to love to live. Love to live to learn so that you may live the life that you yearn.
author: Rico Dasheem

quote: The aim of life is to live, and to live means to be aware, joyously, drunkenly, serenely, divinely aware.
author: Henry Miller

quote: When in doubt, choose to live.
author: Terry Pratchett,  Thief of Time

quote: Life will just not wait for us to live it:We are in it, now, and Now is the time to Live
author: Michelle Geaney

quote: Life is life. You choose to live it or you do not.
author: Carrie Ryan,  The Dead-Tossed Waves

quote: I'd rather die while I'm living than live while I'm dead.
author: Jimmy Buffett

quote: Live life for the moment because everything else is uncertain!
author: Louis Tomlinson

quote: Live Long and Prosper
author: Leonard Nimoy

quote: Live life as though nobody is watching, and express yourself as though everyone is listening.
author: Nelson Mandela

quote: To live is to be haunted.
author: Philip K. Dick,  Flow My Tears, the Policeman Said

quote: Live fast. Die young. Be wild. Have fun.
author: Lana Del Rey

quote: Want less, live more
author: Benny Bellamacina

quote: I don't want to live, I want to love first and live incidentally.
author: Zelda Fitzgerald

quote: Live life with a purpose and live it full out.
author: Steve Maraboli,  Life, the Truth, and Being Free

quote: To live is so startling it leaves little time for anything else.
author: Emily Dickinson

quote: Live for each second without hesitation
author: Elton John

quote: Life is short,Live it long
author: Zaveric

quote: So since I'm still here livin',I guess I will live on.I could've died for love--But for livin' I was born.
author: Langston Hughes,  Selected Poems

quote: You can't have living without dying. So you can't call it living, what we got. We just are, we just be, like rocks beside the road.
author: Natalie Babbitt,  Tuck Everlasting

quote: Come live in my heart, and pay no rent.
author: Samuel Lover

quote: Stop thinking about life and choose to live it
author: Paulo Coelho,  The Fifth Mountain

quote: Live well, Laugh often, Love much.
author: Bessie Anderson Stanley

quote: When you can live forever what do you live for?
author: Stephenie Meyer

quote: We never live; we are always in the expectation of living.
author: Voltaire

quote: Come live with me and be my Love, And we will all the pleasures prove
author: Christopher Marlowe,  The Complete Plays and Poems

quote: Life is wasted on the living.
author: Douglas Adams

quote: Life is wasted on the living.
author: Douglas Adams,  The Restaurant at the End of the Universe

quote: To live is to have worries and uncertainties. Keep them inside, and they will destroy you for certain--leaving behind a person so callused that emotion can find no root in his heart.
author: Brandon Sanderson,  Elantris

quote: If my life is going to mean anything, I have to live it myself.
author: Rick Riordan,  The Lightning Thief

quote: Learn from yesterday, live for today, look to tomorrow, rest this afternoon.
author: Charles M. Schulz,  Charlie Brown's Little Book of Wisdom

quote: Live in the beauty of love to live in peace.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: To live is to change, and to be perfect is to have changed often.
author: John Henry Newman

quote: I'd rather die my way than live yours.
author: Lauren Oliver,  Delirium

quote: Life is a gift, but living is a choice.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Dream the life you desire. Then live it with passion and love.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: To live is to change, to acquire the words of a story, and that is the only celebration we mortals really know.
author: Barbara Kingsolver,  The Poisonwood Bible

quote: Life is problems. Living is solving problems.
author: Raymond E. Feist,  Silverthorn

quote: I want to live my life, not record it.
author: Jackie Kennedy
